Posted By: Brad Green

I'm looking for an 1887 N284 Buchner Gold Coin (of the baseball variety).  I would prefer a graded card.  I'm looking for a good-looking VG card, but would consider a Gd card with nice eye appeal or a well-priced VG-Ex card.  Please send front and back scans with asking price.  Thanks!

Posted By: Scot York
Email sent.

I found a nice one.  Thanks to those who helped me out!
